dict.acceptation: 调查，审查；询问，质问，质询，追究；探究；打听；

sent.orig: Inquiry System is the only reform necessary preliminary inquiry combined with a total of Tender Inquiry.
sent.trans: 询价制中唯一需要改革的就是将初步询价与累计投标询价合二为一。

sent.orig: Finally, the type of preliminary inquiry combined with a total of Tender Inquiry, Inquiry perfect mechanism.
sent.trans: 最后，则是将初步询价与累计投标询价合二为一，完善询价机制。

sent.orig: Your inquiry has been sent. Our customer representative will address your inquiry shortly.
sent.trans: 你的查询已被送出，我们的客户服务代表会尽快处理有关提问。

sent.orig: Inquiry is divided into two phases, preliminary inquiry and book building.
sent.trans: 询价分为初步询价和累计投标询价。

sent.orig: Please input 16 digit code into inquiry banner and identification code, and then click inquiry.
sent.trans: 您只需要将16位的防伪数码输入查询窗口，并输入验证码，然后点击查询即可。
